class TestRawToStandardisedExcel(unittest.TestCase):
    ''' 
    unit tests to test the functions contained within py_1_raw_to_standardised_hr_functions
        validate_parameters(storage_acc, raw_container, raw_source_folder, raw_name, standardised_container, standardised_source_folder, standardised_name, linked_service, sheet_name=0, header_row=0)
        def validate_parameters(structure construction)
        def validate_parameters(parameters not being strings)
        def validate_parameters(sheet_name not being a string or an integer)
        def validate_parameters(header_row not being an integer)
        def _cleanse_headers(df)
        def _change_types(df)
        def ingest_excel_to_parquet(storage_acc, raw_container, raw_source_folder, raw_name, standardised_container, standardised_source_folder, standardised_name, linked_service, sheet_name=0, header=0)
        ---- def enable_delta_on_parquet(standardised_container, standardised_source_folder)  FEATURE TEST
        def lakedb_table_sparksql(db_name,delta_lake_table_name,standardised_container, standardised_source_folder)
    '''
    #WORKING
    def test_vp_constructor_path_string(self):
        ''' Checking for file string path being abfss and not https or other formats '''
        with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
            #validate_parameters(storage_acc, raw_container, raw_source_folder, raw_name, standardised_container, standardised_source_folder, standardised_name, linked_service)
            validate_parameters('pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'hello', 'Fileshare/SAP_HR/2022-08/', 'Addresses - 20220831.xlsx', 'abfss://odw-standardised@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'HR/addresses/', 'Addresses - 20220831.snappy.parquet', 'ls_storage')
        self.assertTrue(str(context.exception), "File path string is not of abfss:// type")  

    #WORKING
    def test_vp_parameters_as_string(self):
        ''' Checking for file parameters to only be strings '''
        with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
            validate_parameters('pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'Fileshare/SAP_HR/2022-08/', 'Addresses - 20220831.xlsx', 'abfss://odw-standardised@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'HR/addresses/', 'Addresses - 20220831.snappy.parquet', 111)
        self.assertTrue(str(context.exception), "Parameters: linked_service not of type string")
 
    #WORKING
    def test_vp_sheet_name(self):
        ''' Checking that the sheet name states is either a number or a string (or empty) '''
        with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
            validate_parameters('pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'Fileshare/SAP_HR/2022-08/', 'Addresses - 20220831.xlsx', 'abfss://odw-standardised@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'HR/addresses/', 'Addresses - 20220831.snappy.parquet', 'ls_storage', True, 0)
        self.assertTrue(str(context.exception), "Sheet name should either be a string or a integer")
 
    #WORKING
    def test_vp_header_row(self):
        ''' Checking for the value for the header of the sheet should be a number '''
        with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
            validate_parameters('pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'Fileshare/SAP_HR/2022-08/', 'Addresses - 20220831.xlsx', 'abfss://odw-standardised@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/', 'HR/addresses/', 'Addresses - 20220831.snappy.parquet', 'ls_storage', 1, "hello")
        self.assertTrue(str(context.exception), "Header row should be an integer value")
 
    #WORKING
    def test_ch_cleansing_headers(self):
        '''Checking the cleansing headers process: headers sanitised'''
        import pandas as pd
        test_data = {'hello world__all ':['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']}
        tdf = pd.DataFrame(test_data)
        rtdf = _cleanse_headers(tdf)
        self.assertEqual(rtdf.columns, pd.Index(['hello_world_all'], dtype='object'))

    #WORKING
    def test_ch_dataframe_error(self):
        '''Checking the cleansing headers process: input not a dataframe error'''
        with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
            _cleanse_headers('hello world')
        self.assertTrue('Expecting a pandas dataframe')

    #WORKING
    def test_ct_change_types(self):
        '''Checking the cleansing headers process'''
        import pandas as pd
        df1 = pd.DataFrame({'my_table':[1, 'example']})
        df2 = pd.DataFrame({'my_table':['1', 'example']})
        df3 = _change_types(df1)
        self.assertEqual(True, df2.equals(df3))

    #WORKING
    def test_ct_dataframe_error(self):
        '''Checking the change types process: input not a dataframe error'''
        with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
            _change_types('hello world')
        self.assertTrue('Expecting a pandas dataframe')
